item.description:
The Old Colony Planning Council, as part of its ongoing Pedestrian and Bicycle Connectivity Study for the region, will be hosting a public input session at the Plymouth Public Library, Otto Fehlow Room.

A draft concept map of bike and pedestrian trail links being considered, and how those tie in to other regional bike paths in our south coast region is available. (Follow link to PDF file of map.)

Your attendance and comments are welcome, or comments in the instance that you cannot attend the meeting! (Send comments  to  Valerie Massard, Town Planner: vmassard@townhall.plymouth.ma.us She can be reached at (508) 747-1620 x142  )

Never heard of the Old Colony Planning Council? Neither had I. You can read their studies and powerpoints on bicycle access at http://www.ocpcrpa.org/bike_ped_study.html

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Public input session on proposed bike and pedestrian trails
